mapper.select: SELECT userId, userPw, userName, nickName, signupDate, updateDate, deleteDate, adminStatus, point, profileImage, phone, reportCount, reportDate FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userId, userPw, userName, nickName, profileImage, phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{profileImage}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userId = #{userId}, userPw = #{userPw}, userName = #{userName}, nickName = #{nickName}, profileImage = #{profileImage}, phone = #{phone} WHERE userId = #{userId}
